2019.Title: Parasite
2019.Synopsis: A South Korean film that explores class differences and the relationship between two families.

2019.Title: The Irishman
2019.Synopsis: An epic gangster drama illustrating the life of hitman Frank Sheeran.

2019.Title: Marriage Story
2019.Synopsis: A compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

2019.Title: Jojo Rabbit
2019.Synopsis: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.
Two young British soldiers during the First World War are given an impossible mission.

2020.Title: Nomadland
2020.Synopsis: A woman in her sixties, after losing everything in the Great Recession, lives as a modern-day nomad.

2020.Title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
2020.Synopsis: The story of seven people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention.

2020.Title: Minari
2020.Synopsis: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream.

2020.Title: Promising Young Woman
2020.Synopsis: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

2020.Title: Sound of Metal
2020.Synopsis: A heavy metal drummer's life is turned upside down when he begins to lose his hearing.

2021.Title: The Power of the Dog
2021.Synopsis: A charismatic rancher inspires fear and awe in those around him, but his world changes when his brother brings home a new wife and her son.

2021.Title: Dune
2021.Synopsis: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

2021.Title: Licorice Pizza
2021.Synopsis: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up and navigating first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

2021.Title: CODA
2021.Synopsis: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults), Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

2021.Title: The Green Knight
2021.Synopsis: A fantasy re-telling of the medieval story of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.

2022.Synopsis: A finely crafted story about a deteriorating friendship on a remote island off the west coast of Ireland.

2022.Title: Till
2022.Synopsis: An emotional recounting of Mamie Till Mobley's pursuit of justice for her son.

2022.Synopsis: The story of the Agojie, the all-female unit of warriors who protected the African Kingdom of Dahomey.

2022.Title: Prey
2022.Synopsis: A Predator prequel that combines action with character development, set in the Comanche Nation 300 years ago.

2022.Title: The Northman
2022.Synopsis: An epic revenge thriller exploring how far a Viking prince will go to seek justice for his murdered father.

2022.Title: X
2022.Synopsis: A fresh spin on the classic slasher formula, set in rural Texas.

2023.Synopsis: A smart and provocative modern parable set in a high school.
